jobExperienceList.description: I took part of a team as a full-stack developer on a health care company from UK. I developed new features and fixed issues/bugs. The Frontend was built on ReactJS using Typescript. The Backend was built using .NET Core (C#) and MySQL as database using AWS services. Also, used AWS services such as SQS, CloudSearch, CloudWatch, EC2 and Route53. Using Azure DevOps as CI/CD. Added integration with Google Sign In. Created a subscription system. Created API calls to provide integration with Chargify, CQC, NumVerify and Fountain.

I worked with Kanban methodology using different tools and technologies in multiple projects from USA. Here I learnt React, NodeJS, Typescript, icroservices, non-relational databases and used Azure and AWS services. Helped to develop a multi-cloud solution on serverless repository with NodeJS. Also, created an AWS SQS function with Javascript to run an open-source antivirus on files uploaded on a S3 bucket.
I worked for a French firm using ASP.NET (C#), doing maintenance of a website, creating new features and fixing bugs.

This was my first job as a Software Developer. I worked for multiple projects and clients. I used a lot of different technologies such as Cobol, .NET WebForms, Angular, CSS, HTML, Git, and MVC pattern. Also learnt to work with Agile methodologies.
